name: Portals + Portal Gun
description:
This asset contains a copy of the portal gun from the game Portal. It's fully working and allows you to create two portals which are connected to each other. You can move your character and any objects through the portals with saving its velocity.

Portal gun and portals are fully animated and include all necessary SFX.

This package contains:

  • Portal gun model
  • Fully working portals
  • SFX and animations
  • Well structured and easy to read code
  • Detailed documentation
